front.title: MVPN using Segment Routing and BIER for High Reachability Multicast Deployment

abstract.t: Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER) introduces a stateless multicast approach for a specific IGP area. Segment Routing introduces an approach for end-to-end stateless deployment for both inter-area and inter-as scenarios. This document proposes a MVPN using Segment Routing and BIER for a high reachability multicast deployment.
